definition: Guangdong Pharmaceutical University

sentences.english: Guangdong cuisine uses a great variety of materials, even including the meat snakes.
sentences.chinese: 广东菜用料广泛，甚至包括蛇肉。

sentences.english: Most of the people who eat dim sum are Cantonese.
sentences.chinese: 吃粤式点心的人主要是广东人。

sentences.english: Grads get offers in grassroots-level schools teaching in Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 广东应届毕业生获得农村学校教书的就业机会。

sentences.english: The bridge were built by stayers since Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥是广东的务工佣人建的。

sentences.english: One of his colleagues was murdered 11 years ago by Guangdong gangsters.
sentences.chinese: 他的一个同事11年前被广东的歹徒谋杀。

sentences.english: The driver is talkative and a good guide and had been working in Guangdong before.
sentences.chinese: 司机开朗，曾在广东打过工，一路是个好向导。

sentences.english: Objective To study the poor eyesight situation of the students in the Xingning city and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解广东省兴宁市城乡中小学生视力不良状况。

sentences.english: The position will be based mainly in SiHui city & Foshan, Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 工作地点主要是在广东佛山三水四会市。

sentences.english: Liu Xiaofeng, 20, from Guangdong Peizheng College, has a younger sister.
sentences.chinese: 20岁的刘晓凤就读于广东培正学院，她有一个妹妹。

sentences.english: Zhan Tianyou was born in 1861, in Nanhai County, Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 詹天佑1861年出生在广东省南海县。

sentences.english: Shunde, a small city in Guangdong, was buried in debt.
sentences.chinese: 而位于广东省的顺德市，此时也是负债累累。

sentences.english: Chen Shisong, born in 1963 in Lufeng Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 陈石松，1963年生于广东陆丰市。

sentences.english: A great number of the Nationalist Party leaders came from Guangdong Province, the cradle of the party.
sentences.chinese: 国民党发迹于广东，也造就了大批粤籍党国领袖。

sentences.english: Located in the northwest of Guangdong province, Guangning is a beautiful city.
sentences.chinese: 位于广东省的西北部，广宁是一个美丽的城市。

sentences.english: Lately strikers in Guangdong have done even better.
sentences.chinese: 最近在广东的罢工走得甚至更远。

sentences.english: Song and yuan dynasties, Hong Kong in administrative subjection guangdong dongguan.
sentences.chinese: 宋元时期，香港在行政上隶属广东东莞。

definition: Fujian province (Fukien) in east China, abbr. 福 or 閩|闽, capital Fuzhou 福州/Fujian province (Fukien) in Taiwan
Zhejiang province (Chekiang) in east China, abbr. 浙, capital Hangzhou 杭州
Liaoning province in northeast China, short name 遼|辽[Liao2], capital Shenyang 瀋陽|沈阳[Shen3 yang2]
Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区 in South Central China, on the border with Vietnam, abbr. 桂, capital Nanning 南寧|南宁/until 1959, Guangxi province
Jiangsu province (Kiangsu) in southeast China, abbr. 蘇|苏, capital Nanjing 南京
Shenzhen subprovincial city in Guangdong, special economic zone close to Hong Kong
Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong/Canton
Shandong, province in northeast China, short name 魯|鲁[Lu3], capital Jinan 濟南|济南[Ji3 nan2]
Sichuan province (Szechuan) in southwest China, abbr. 川 or 蜀, capital Chengdu 成都
Jiangxi province (Kiangsi) in southeast China, abbr. 赣, capital Nanchang 南昌
Guangdong province (Kwangtung) in south China, short name 粵|粤[Yue4], capital Guangzhou 廣州|广州
Hunan province in south central China, abbr. 湘, capital Changsha 長沙|长沙[Chang2 sha1]
Dongguan prefecture-level city in Guangdong 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3]
Hubei Province (Hupeh) in central China, abbr. 鄂[E4], capital Wuhan 武漢|武汉[Wu3 han4]
Xinjiang/Uighur autonomous region 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区
the two provinces of Guangdong and Guangxi (traditional)
